arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

		-- play sound on gizmo 
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorGizmo, EG_IDOL_SFX)
		
		-- wait a beat to allow for gizmo death anim 
		Hydra.Wait(2)
		
		-- destroy gizmo, remove sigil decal
		idProxy = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorGizmo, "PROXY")[1]
		Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idProxy, 2)
		
		nCrystalHolderCount = nCrystalHolderCount - 1
		
		-- escalate encounter
		if nCrystalHolderCount == 4 then
		-- do Champ spawn for WT3+
			if Hydra.GameGetCurrentWorldTier() + 1 >= 3 then 			-- +1 to account for world tier 1 starting at 0 index
				Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(ID_SELF, "CHAMPIONS")
			end
		elseif nCrystalHolderCount == 3 then
			Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(ID_SELF, "ELITES")
			Hydra.ActorDisable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "EASY_WAVES")[1])
			Hydra.ActorEnable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "MEDIUM_WAVES")[1])
		elseif nCrystalHolderCount == 2 then
			-- do Champ spawn for WT4+
			if Hydra.GameGetCurrentWorldTier() + 1 >= 4 then 			-- +1 to account for world tier 1 starting at 0 index
				Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(ID_SELF, "CHAMPIONS")
			end
		elseif nCrystalHolderCount == 1 then
			Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(ID_SELF, "ELITES")
			Hydra.ActorDisable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "MEDIUM_WAVES")[1])
			Hydra.ActorEnable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "HARD_WAVES")[1])
		elseif nCrystalHolderCount == 0 then
			-- turn off all monster wave spawners
			Hydra.ActorDisable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "HARD_WAVES")[1])
		end
end

function Start(flGameTime)
	
	local N_INITIAL_CRYSTAL_COUNT = 5
	local tRemainingCrystals = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "HOLDERS_FROM_QUEST")
	local nCrystalsRemaining = #tRemainingCrystals
	local nIntensity = (N_INITIAL_CRYSTAL_COUNT - nCrystalsRemaining) / N_INITIAL_CRYSTAL_COUNT

	
	-- draw clientside burst attractor from remaining crystals to the tornado
	for i, idCrystalHolder in pairs(tRemainingCrystals) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCrystalHolder)
		and (Hydra.GetRandomFloat(0, 0.8) <= (nIntensity+0.4)) then -- frequency increases the closer to finish
			
			local idProxy = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idCrystalHolder, "ATTR_PROXY")[1]
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idProxy) then 
				Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectIntensity(idProxy, nIntensity)
				Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectDuration(idProxy, 3)
				Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idProxy, 4 + 4*nIntensity)
				Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idProxy, ID_SELF, EG_ATTRACTOR)
				Hydra.Wait(Hydra.GetRandomFloat(0.1, 0.3))
			end
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	if Hydra.BuffIsOnActor(S_TORNADO_DEBUFF, "STORM_EFFECTS", idActor) then 
		Hydra.BuffRemove(S_TORNADO_DEBUFF, "STORM_EFFECTS", idActor)
	end
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
for i, idCrystalHolder in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "HOLDERS_FROM_QUEST")) do 
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idCrystalHolder, false)
end

-- begin stream of demons from storm center
Hydra.ActorEnable(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "EASY_WAVES")[1])

-- do Champ spawn for WT5 only
if Hydra.GameGetCurrentWorldTier() + 1 >= 5 then 			-- +1 to account for world tier 1 starting at 0 index
	Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(ID_SELF, "CHAMPIONS")
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(flTimeRemaining)

	-- Heroic failure callback
	Hydra.QuestCallbackSetComplete(241)
	
	-- This phase completion callback
	Hydra.QuestCallbackSetComplete(214)	
end

function Start(szScopedGroup, PrefabID)
	
	-- The mastery completion callback to ensure it passes
	Hydra.QuestCallbackSetComplete(239)	
	
	-- The phase completion callback
	Hydra.QuestCallbackSetComplete(214)	
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
-- do boom vfx and kill tornado and all remaining demons
for i, idMonster in pairs (Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup("EH_Monsters")) do 
		Hydra.QActorPower(idMonster, S_SKELETON_DEATH_POWER)
		Hydra.QActorKill(idMonster)
end

for i, idTornadoBits in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "TORNADO")) do
	Hydra.ActorGizmoOperate(idTornadoBits)
end

-- adjust this wait time to account for the death anim of the tornado
Hydra.Wait(2)

for i, idTornadoBits in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "TORNADO")) do
	Hydra.ActorDelete(idTornadoBits)
end

-- respect capstone boss reveals when choosing a boss
local nCurrentWorldTier = Hydra.GameGetCurrentWorldTier() + 1 -- +1 to account for world tier 1 starting at 0 index
local tValidBossList= T_BOSSES_BY_WORLDTIER[math.max(nCurrentWorldTier, 3)]
FYShuffle(tValidBossList)

Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_SELF, EG_CAM_SHAKE)
Hydra.Wait(0.5)

local idSpawnedBoss = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(tValidBossList[1], ID_SELF, true, 0, 0)
Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idSpawnedBoss, EG_BOSS_SUMMON_FX)

-- to track defeat in later CBs
Hydra.ActorAddToPrefabScopedGroup(idSpawnedBoss, "EH_Boss")

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start()
	local sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD

	if Hydra.QuestGetBonusPhaseResult() then
		sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD_HEROIC
	end
	
	Events.SpawnRewardChest(CHEST_LOCATION, sChest)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

	-- set up worship vignette
	Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idActorSpawned)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idActorSpawned, POWER_WORSHIP_LOOP)
end

function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idActorDamaged) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idActorDamaged) then
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorDamaged)
		Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idActorDamaged, POWER_DEFAULT_IDLE)
	end
end

unk_993f312:
-- Event Specific Data
ID_SELF = Hydra.QuestGetOwner()
CHEST_LOCATION = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "Chest_Location")[1]
T_MONSTER_ID_TO_CH_ID = {}
T_CH_ID_TO_MONSTER_COUNT = {}
nCrystalHolderCount = 5
nKillCount = 0
N_WORSHIPER_COUNT = 15

T_BOSSES_BY_WORLDTIER = {}
T_BOSSES_BY_WORLDTIER[3] = { ID_BOSS_SKELETON, ID_BOSS_VAMPIRE, ID_BOSS_SKELETON_CAP }
T_BOSSES_BY_WORLDTIER[4] = { ID_BOSS_SKELETON, ID_BOSS_VAMPIRE, ID_BOSS_SKELETON_CAP, ID_BOSS_CANNIBAL_CAP }
T_BOSSES_BY_WORLDTIER[5] = { ID_BOSS_SKELETON, ID_BOSS_VAMPIRE, ID_BOSS_SKELETON_CAP, ID_BOSS_CANNIBAL_CAP, ID_BOSS_ELIAS_CAP }

-- set up the worshippers... more setup in background callback
for i, idWorshiperSpawner in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "WORSHIPERS")) do 
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idWorshiperSpawner, false)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idWorshiperSpawner)
end

-- draw ritual vfx
for i, idCrystalHolder in pairs (Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(ID_SELF, "HOLDERS_FROM_QUEST")) do 
	Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idCrystalHolder, true)
	local idProxy = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idCrystalHolder, "PROXY")[1]
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idProxy) then 
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idProxy, 5)
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectDuration(idProxy, 2)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idProxy, EG_SIGIL, true)
	end
end
